entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @NYGovCuomo I trust 2 people to tell the truth. You and #DrFauci. My 90 year old mother is not going to die from #COVID19 because of bloviator @realDonaldTrump & the ineptitude of those he surrounds himself with. #ListenToTheDoctors #NotDying4WallStreet #25thAmendmentNow
